data.title: Tony Rimbault on LinkedIn: Super excited to share our newest addition! Escape to a hidden oasis at…
data.meta_description:
Super excited to share our newest addition! 

Escape to a hidden oasis at The Ivy Chelsea Garden’s The Glasshouse. Nestled in the garden, this private dining… | 17 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
Noema MYK - Don Julio 1942 pop up store/cocktail bar is now open. Super proud of this incredible partnership we've been working on and the huge added value to the best restaurant on the Island. Come and Enjoy some exclusive cocktails or come get your personalised 1942 engraved bottle in the restaurant or to take away! Thank you to all the Diageo team Henry Leonard, Tom Theakston and James Kemp

Dear Tony I just wanted to write to you to thank you most sincerely for the amazing time we all had on Sunday. We have been inundated with messages of thanks and positive comments from all our guests. The food was delicious and plenty, and the service was impeccable. Lewis and the team on the day went above and beyond. Thank you must sincerely and humbly for making the celebration of our first grandchild a huge success. Please pass on our most sincere and heartfelt thanks to all the team. Warm regards PS - we look forward to hosting many more events at Caprice Holdings venues. Well done all Lewis Goodsell and the team.

The Private Room at The Ivy West Street in Central London is as glamorous and in demand as the restaurant downstairs. Up to 60 guests can be seated for a wedding breakfast, birthday and anniversary celebrations, corporate lunches or dinner, or 100 for cocktail parties, book launches and canapé reception. Following an extensive refurbishment, The Ivy and its Private Room have a fresh new look, fashioned by Martin Brudnizki Design Studio. The most striking differences in the Private Room include a twinkling bespoke bar and a stunning collection of contemporary art. These, married with the signature harlequin stained glass windows and oak panelling, create a truly elegant and irresistibly alluring space. Our chefs will create the menus for your event, inspired equally by the seasons and by the eclectic and imaginative menu in the restaurant. Using only the finest ingredients, our chefs can write menus to suit personal tastes and dietary requirements. Complimentary flowers, candles and menu cards are provided for the tables. Music is very much on the agenda, whether it’s a jazz trio, string quartet or anything in between, we can arrange the perfect accompaniment. To enquire: https://lnkd.in/e2CnVi4D

Another successful event held at Noema Mykonos in our beautiful Saloon for one of our prestigious client. The Saloon A space for spontaneous gatherings and ritual festivities, Nōema embodies the open-hearted soul of Mykonos, where every occasion is an opportunity for a feast. Featuring its own bar and floor to ceiling doors which open onto the Avlí, the indoor Saloon is the ultimate space for an intimate gathering that blends with the ambience of the restaurant as the night progresses. Noema, the best restaurant on the Island. To enquire: https://lnkd.in/eqjR5xF8

Our amazing brand new Private room at Harry’s Victoria is now available to book! To enquire: https://lnkd.in/eERywwn9 Harry's Victoria offers an intimate private space for events and functions which is available to book seven days a week for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Beneath the hustle and bustle of our restaurant, down the golden staircase, The Vittorio Private Dining Room accommodates up to 14 seated guests, and is the ideal space for all occasions. With soft furnishings and decor evoking the Italian 'dolce vita' and the Italian Renaissance, the space features Venetian-inspired oak, brass and Murano glass, bringing a touch of glamour to the room.

Wimbledon get ready for another amazing tournament! The Danby Room: A light and bright jewel in South West London’s crown, The Danby Room is The Ivy Café Wimbledon’s rarified retreat for private dining. Bathed in the natural light that floods the room, locally-referenced artwork depicts Wimbledon House, the official residence of The Earl of Danby. Meanwhile, Art Deco-style brass lights illuminate the polished parquet floor and the burnt orange leather chairs, adding subtle touches of glamour as the sun sets and the light changes. The Danby Room can cater for whatever you have planned. The dining options are as versatile as the venue itself, and Executive Chef, Sean Burbidge has created a collection of seasonal menus to ensure that we offer the very best: any time of the year, any time of the day. to book: https://lnkd.in/ekGruPC8
